story.title: Our Story
content: HurayraPetFood.ae was founded with a simple yet powerful mission: to provide Muslim pet owners with high-quality, halal-certified cat food that meets both nutritional excellence and Islamic dietary requirements.

Named after Abu Hurayrah (رضي الله عنه), the beloved companion of Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) known for his deep love and care for cats, we honor this legacy by creating products that reflect our commitment to quality, compassion, and faith.

Starting in 2020, we recognized a gap in the market for premium halal pet food in the UAE and wider Middle East region. What began as a small operation has grown into a trusted brand serving thousands of Muslim families across the Emirates.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the highest quality halal cat food that nourishes pets while respecting Islamic values and supporting Muslim pet owners across the UAE and beyond.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading provider of halal pet food in the Middle East, setting the standard for quality, ethics, and customer satisfaction while promoting the Sunnah of kindness to animals.
